full_text:
Re: Epstein Update
From Kevin Pistro
To Ray Ormond
Date 2019/07/24 11:08
Subject: Re: Epstein Update
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Can you call when you break free for a moment. Thanks.
>>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 10:56 AM >>>
Inmate Epstein #76318-054 was removed from Suicide Watch and stepped down to Psychological Observation. He was just escorted to Health Services for a follow-up assessment/evaluation. Once completed, he will be escorted to Attorney Conference to meet with his Attorney.
[b)(b)(b)(7)(C); (b)(7)(E); (b)(7)(F)
J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521-[b)(6)
Page 1616
DOJ-OGR-00023621

additional_notes: The document contains redactions, indicated by [b)(b)(b)(7)(C); (b)(7)(E); (b)(7)(F) and [b)(6). The email discusses the status of Inmate Epstein, including his removal from Suicide Watch and subsequent actions.
